downloadTitle: Standalone SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) DevOps Tools
downloadDescription: Standalone SSIS DevOps Tools provide a set of executables to do SSIS CICD tasks. Without the dependency on the installation of Visual Studio or SSIS runtime, these executables can be easily integrated with any CICD platform.
detailsSection:
Standalone SSIS DevOps Tools provide a set of executables to do SSIS CICD tasks. Without the dependency on the installation of Visual Studio or SSIS runtime, these executables can be easily integrated with any CICD platform. The executables provided are:

SSISBuild.exe: build SSIS projects in project deployment model or package deployment model.
SSISDeploy.exe: deploy ISPAC files to SSIS catalog, or DTSX files and their dependencies to file system.
installInstructionSection:
1. On this page, click Download to start the download.
2. To save the download on your computer so that you can install it later, click Save.
3. To cancel the installation, click Cancel.
